All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
Controller class for adding appointments
AddCustomerController
Controller class for adding a new customer.
Appointment
Represents an appointment.
AppointmentReportController
Controller class for generating appointment reports.
AppointmentTimeManager
Utility class for managing appointment times.
BillingEntry
Represents a billing entry.
BillingReportController
Controller class for Billing Reports.
Customer
Represents a customer.
JDBC
 
LoginController
The LoginController class controls the login UI and authentication login.
Main
The main class responsible for launching the application.
MainMenuController
Controller for the main menu.
ScheduleReportController
The ScheduleReportController class controls the functionality of the Schedule Report view.
UpdateAppointmentController
The UpdateAppointmentController class manages the functionality of updating appointments.
UpdateCustomerController
Controller class for updating customer information.
UserActivityLogger
Utility class for logging user activities.
UserHandler
Handles user-related operations such as setting and retrieving the logged-in user, clearing the logged-in user, and retrieving the user ID by username.
